A '''Great Master''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is a [[Slavery|slave-trader]] from the city of [[Meereen]], on the coast of [[Slaver's Bay]]. He is played by guest star [[Emilio Doorgasingh]] and appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".
